content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Max. I am open to hearing your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 400 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still not high enough. Please make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine, let's say 600 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still not high enough. Please make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: This is the best I can do. How about 650 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still not high enough. Please make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 675 Euros per month. This is as high as I can go.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
